data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Tsuga mertensiana (Mountain hemlock) from sample CRATER-101

Exposition NW, Slope 10 deg, Geology: Vulk. Tuff, verwittert, Tree line 2300 m, av. Tree height 22 m, Tree cover 40%, Shrub cover 10%, Herb cover 50%, Vegatation type: Alt. Best. mit allen Altersst. Homogen, Film number: 748A
